Positive: Earlier this week, @CPHO_Canada said the health system was prepared for a traveller arriving in Canada with coronavirus. The key focus for officials here was having measures place to prevent further spread of the illness. Ontario's health minister says “the system is working”.
Negative: On coronavirus, Canada's Chief Public Health Officer tells @VassyKapelos "we are certainly preparing for the potential of a first case". Screening measures for international travellers announced yesterday aren't in place yet at airports. But Dr. Tam says risk to Canada is low.
